body_html:
libcupti is available in Ubuntu 16.04 xenial only for CUDA 7.5, not CUDA 8. We can use deb packages from Ubuntu zesty repo:

wget http://cz.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/multiverse/n/nvidia-cuda-toolkit/libcupti8.0_8.0.44-3_amd64.deb
wget http://cz.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/multiverse/n/nvidia-cuda-toolkit/libcupti-dev_8.0.44-3_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i libcupti8.0_8.0.44-3_amd64.deb libcupti-dev_8.0.44-3_amd64.deb

It can be tested eg. by the scripts in https://medium.com/towards-data-science/howto-profile-tensorflow-1a49fb18073d.

body:
`libcupti` is available in Ubuntu 16.04 xenial only for CUDA 7.5, not CUDA 8. We can use deb packages from Ubuntu zesty repo:

```
wget http://cz.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/multiverse/n/nvidia-cuda-toolkit/libcupti8.0_8.0.44-3_amd64.deb
wget http://cz.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/multiverse/n/nvidia-cuda-toolkit/libcupti-dev_8.0.44-3_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i libcupti8.0_8.0.44-3_amd64.deb libcupti-dev_8.0.44-3_amd64.deb
```

It can be tested eg. by the scripts in https://medium.com/towards-data-science/howto-profile-tensorflow-1a49fb18073d.

```

2017-08-22 16:17:42.740833: I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:139] successfully opened CUDA library libcupti.so.8.0 locally
```
